caption: The man on the stairs shout something to the men in the room and rush away. And after a while, a group of people with blue outfit go into the room. A man with crush struggle downstairs and have a talk with a woman with curly hair. Then he begins to walk on the street, until he gets a phone call. While taking the phone, he finds some camera looking at him. Then he goes on a car, in which is a woman. They talk for a while until the man is sent somewhere to meet another man. That man has an umbrella in his hands, and they begin to argue.

global.answer: There're five people in the video.
